Producer: Chris Hanley, Fernando Sulichin, Timothy Wayne Peternel, Danny Vinik
Screenwriter: Will De Los Santos, Creighton Vero
Production Co: Saggitaire, Muse Productions, Little Magic Films, Brink Films
Synopsis: A drug addict (Jason Schwartzman) meets an assortment of wild characters (John Leguizamo, Mena Suvari) while on a three-day speed binge in Los Angeles.
Title: Spun
